section.p: That was tactless. Gnomes are very sensitive about their appearance.
The man's face contorts with rage and he waves his hands about in an arcane manner. An ancient gnomic curse, perhaps?
Your nose starts to grow, warts erupt inside your nostrils, your eyebrows vanish and your lower lip turns green and ulcerous. Your face is now even more ugly than his.

Your CHARISMA falls to 1 and will not recover unless the curse is lifted. Note that you are under a
.
The gnome runs off into the hills, laughing.
There is little else for you to do but travel on. .
